I'm a co-founder and CTO of Guided Clinical Solutions. We're building a medication safety platform for the operating room to help clinicians and patients.

We're looking for a Product Manager to join our team to help design and develop our platform.

Check us out at https://www.guidedclinical.com

If you're a product manager who is passionate about improving healthcare and building software that has real impact, we'd love to talk with you.
